Name: Fight mistress
Text: You stand tall before the vampress and declare: 'Servant of satan. Your time in this world has come to an end!'

Name: Ready yourself for a surprise attack
Mention zombie in kitchen
Text: Her smirk is replaced with disgust. 'A good servant turned traitor! Nothing sickens me more... He tried to escape with my ring. I punished him for that. He hid it well though, i never managed to find it. Thus I am marooned in this eternal torment.'

Name: Speak about Robert
Text: My beloved husband to be. If only he could see that my love was true.. But he rejected me at the altar! So Iv shown him my pain.. ON MY ALTAR! I condemned his soul and all that is his to damnation! Of course.. I was his as well. I knew this.

Name: What do you hope to acheive?
Text: An eternity of suffering! I am content with my share in the world. I have bonded my fate with satan and hence i cannot die! And as long as my covenant stands true, Robert and all that is his will suffer!

Name: I have been told that this place is cursed
Text: The devil himself was our pastor! My beloved and I shall be together forever! Even if we are slain by the likes of you we shall return time and again to repeat the cycle! Such was the price we paid for my dear roberts rejection... Have you ever been so betrayed?
